signin_subtitle_wrong_password: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
signin_subtitle_user_not_found: We couldn’t find an account with this email.

workerOption: I am an individual and have no employees
employerOption: I am a company or an individual with employees
signup_login_as_worker: Log in as an individual with no employees
signin_worker_title: Sign in as an individual with no employees
signup_employer_email_used_by_worker: This email is already used by an individual account with no employees.
signin_password_reset_sent: Password reset link has been sent to your email
signin_incomplete_message: Your registration was not completed. How would you like to continue?
signin_subtitle: Enter your email and password to continue.
register_subtitle: Step 2 of 2 — fill in your public profile.
register_progress_note: After saving your profile you will be redirected to Stripe to complete the payout setup.
register_stripe_note: After saving, you will be taken to Stripe to set up how you receive payments. Stripe is a licensed payment provider. Your bank details go only into Stripe — we never see or store them. Please have your IBAN ready.
register_stripe_note_employer: After saving, you will be redirected to Stripe to set up how you receive payments. Stripe is a licensed payment provider. Your bank details are entered only in Stripe — we never see or store them. Please have your IBAN ready. If you are registered as a company in Switzerland, you may also be asked for your company registration number (e.g. CHE-123.456.789).
noEmployers: You do not have any employers yet.
disclaimer: By joining an employer, you allow them to see your name and Stripe account information.
shareAccessLabel: Allow employer to use my tipping page
shareAccessInfo: If enabled, your employer may display your page when collecting tips.
leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this employer?
accountReady: Your account is ready. Use the tabs below to navigate.
profile.goalStartHelp: If you already had savings before setting this goal — enter the amount. We will calculate progress starting from it.
profile.saveError: Could not save. Please try again.
tip_welcome_message: Thanks for choosing our service — we hope your experience was great!
tip_goal_phrase: Every tip brings me closer to my goal:
employer.tip_goal_phrase: Every tip brings us closer to our goal:
tip.paymentPlaceholder: Here will be the payment form (card, Apple Pay, Google Pay).
personal.title: Personal information
personal.note: To change your name, please contact support — we must verify your identity.
goal.title: Goal
goal.description1: Having a clear goal makes tipping more personal and meaningful.
goal.description2: When guests see what you are working toward, they often give a bit more — because they feel they help make your dream come true.
goal.description5: If you leave the Goal field empty, the Goal section will not be displayed on the payment page.
goal.description3: We will show your progress toward this goal in the app.
goal.description4: When a guest selects a tip amount, they will see how much it moves you toward your goal — this also motivates them to tip more.
goal.startDateHelp: When you reach this goal, set your new goal and choose the date you start saving for it.
title: Photo
recommendation: A square photo is recommended. Max 5 MB.
errorType: Only image files can be uploaded (jpg, png, etc.).
errorSize: The file is too large (max 5 MB).
uploadError: Could not upload photo. Please try again.
payouts_manual_help: When manual payouts are enabled, you decide when to send the money to your bank.
payouts_minAmount_hint: Payouts only when the balance is above this amount.
payouts_currency_hint: Choose the currency you want your payouts to be sent in.
payouts_ready: Your Stripe account is ready for payouts.
payouts_not_ready: Your Stripe account is not ready for payouts yet. Please complete the required information in Stripe.
payouts_go_to_dashboard_hint: You can open your Stripe profile to update your bank account, address, or personal details.
payouts_configure_before_save: Choose how you want to receive your payouts. Don’t forget to save your settings using the button below.
stripe_charges_enabled_ok: Your account is ready to accept payments.
stripe_charges_enabled_bad: Your account is not ready to accept payments yet. Please complete your Stripe registration before using the QR code.
qr_description: Download this QR code and place it on your flyer, card or poster.
qr_error_no_slug: QR code link is not available.
reset_password_subtitle: Enter a new password to regain access.
reset_password_success: Your password has been updated. Redirecting…
signin_forgot_subtitle: Enter your email to receive a reset link.
employer.defaultGreeting: Welcome! Thank you for supporting our team.
schemes_blocked_participants_title: These participants must complete Stripe onboarding:
schemes_qr_warning: Ask all participants to complete Stripe onboarding before using the QR-code.
schemes_owner_hint: Here you can choose whose profile will appear on the payment page, and which elements (goal, amount, progress) will be shown to the customer.
schemes_created_notice: The scheme has been created — you can review and adjust its details below.
schemes_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scheme? Please do not use the QR code that belonged to this scheme anymore.
schemes_deleted_success: The scheme has been deleted. Please remember not to use the QR code belonging to this scheme anymore.
schemes_intro_text: Configure tip allocation schemes in a way that works best for your team. Add participants, assign percentages for each person, download QR codes and place them where customers can scan them. Participants receive their share instantly when customers make a payment. It's simple and transparent. You can create as many schemes as you need!
schemes_intro_company_hint: If the full amount should go to the company, simply create a scheme where 100% is allocated to the company.
requestSentModalMessage: Your request has been sent. Please wait for employer approval.
employees.invite_hint: Give this code to an employee — they can join the company.
employees.pending_request: This person has requested to join your company.
employees.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove the employee?
employees.stripe_ready_text: Employee is ready to receive payments
employees.stripe_not_ready_text: To accept payments, the employee must complete Stripe onboarding
step1_overview: Here you manage the essential information of your profile. You can always come back and update it at any time.
profile.preview.subtitle: Add your photo, define your goals, and take a look below to see how customers will view your payment page.
profile.preview.title: On this page you create your personal payment profile — a place where customers can safely send tips. Customize the appearance, description and goals — this helps build trust and increases conversions.
step3_employees: Here you add your employees. Ask them to register in the app and give them your invitation code. Approve their request and you will be able to include them in your tip distribution schemes.
step4_schemes: Configure tip distribution schemes in a way that works best for your team. Add participants, assign percentages for each person, download QR codes and place them where customers can scan them. Participants receive their share instantly when customers make a payment. It's simple and transparent. You can create as many schemes as you need!
step5_reports: View real-time Stripe account activity and download detailed reports whenever you need.
step6_payouts: Choose how you prefer to receive your payouts — daily, weekly, or manually on demand. You decide!
signin_wrong_password: The password you entered is incorrect.
schemes_preview_modal_title: This is the screen your customers will see when they scan the QR code of this scheme
payouts_minimum_chf: The minimum payout amount is 5 CHF.
payment_failed_message: Your payment was not completed. Please try again.
onboarding_how_get_money: How do I get my money?
onboarding_profile_photo: Set up my payment page to attract customers (My page)
onboarding_scheme_created: Create a scheme and download my QR code (Schemes)
onboarding_qr_placed: I have placed the QR code where customers can see it
onboarding_payouts_enabled: Enable payouts to my bank account (Payouts)
error.country_not_supported: Only Switzerland and Liechtenstein are supported.
hero_subtitle: Let customers tip employees or teams instantly — no cash, no friction
hero_free_hint: Free to start · No setup cost
how_step1_text: Add your name, photo and goal — no setup required
how_step2_text: Use a QR code or link anywhere your customers are
how_step3_text: Customers tip you instantly — no cash, no friction
trust_subtitle: Clear setup, transparent flow, and a professional payment experience
trust_1_text: Made for Swiss users and CHF-first payouts
trust_2_text: Looks like a real product — not a random payment link
trust_3_text: No setup cost. Create your page and go live
trust_4_text: Card payments with a clean, safe checkout
tipjar_title: A tip page that works for you
tipjar_subtitle: Designed for individuals and teams who want a simple, modern way to receive tips
tipjar_point_1: Tips go directly to you — no cash handling
tipjar_point_2: Customers see your goal and progress in real time
tipjar_point_3: Works for individuals or shared team tips
tipjar_point_4: Clean, professional experience for your customers
hero_subtitle_1: Tips are not a payment — they are a thank you
hero_subtitle_2: A simple way to support great service
hero_subtitle_3: No cash. No pressure. Just appreciation
landing_employer_title: Tip management that works for your team
landing_employer_subtitle: Create flexible, transparent tip distribution schemes — without spreadsheets or conflicts.
